channel.title: Please help small error
channel.description: [sup]client.java:23466: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Equipment location: class client Equipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) // dharoks axe ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . [/sup]

item.title: Please help small error
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

let me make something a sec and ill get it to you

what are you trying to do with it

are you trying to make a certain move for the dharok ae or aree you trying to make it transform you into something[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 11:03:54 AM[/size][hr]ok here we go look for this

public int GetWepAnim()

then after that add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) // dharoks axe
{
return 2067;
}

that shoulnt give any errors

Read full topic

item.description:

[sub]client.java:23466: illegal start of expression
if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) // dharoks axe
^

Press any key to continue . . .[/sub]

item.title: Please help small error
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

please, remove all your bumps, it is anoying. ok, go to client.java and look for the line of the error so look for :

Equipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) // dharoks axe

then make sure the code is like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) // dharoks axe { return 2067; } it should not give errors then

Read full topic
